Package johny.ringescape.server

Interface Summary
AppConstants Interface that contains all constants that are used by the Client and the Server
 

Class Summary
Client Class that contains information about a client
ClientRunner Runnable class that handles the socket communication with the Client
ClientsQueue Class that represents a Queue of requesting Clients (observable by the GameOrganizer)
GameRunner Runnable class that runs during a game
HitTask Checks if the player escaped after the ESCAPE_TIME passes.
MockClient Fake Client class used during development
MockRunnable Fake Client class used during development
Player Class that contains information about a player
PrisonTask Releases a player who got imprisoned after the PRISON_TIME passes.
Server Class that represents the Server
ServerDatabase  
Utils Utility class to print log messages during Server actions
